snippet: Robert Swinston, a former member of Merce Cunningham Dance Company, has applied to become the director of the Centre National de Danse Contemporaine in Angers, France.
abstract: Robert Swinston, a former member of Merce Cunningham Dance Company, has applied to become the director of the Centre National de Danse Contemporaine in Angers, France.

headline.main: Cunningham Legacy to Continue in France?
